server.server_explanation: You need to specify a broker where the Owntracks client can connect to. The servername can either be a local ip adres when using a private broker, or a FQDN. You also need to provide the portnumber. Normally this would be port 1883 and 8883 for secure connections
server.tls: Use a secure connection to the broker (TLS)

client.accuracy_explanation: Sometimes the location accuracy can be very low (i.e. accuracy > 50 meters). This could result in an unwanted event regarding enterin / leaving a geofence. If the location accuracy is below the set value, that event is ignored.
client.topic_explanation: The topic specified will be used in trigger cards when the topic argument is left blanc. Default this value will be set to owntracks/+/+/event.

messages.unable_set_settings: There was an error trying to apply the settings.
messages.error_connect_broker: Unable to connect to the broker, please check the broker settings.
messages.settings_success_tested: Settings succesfully tested. Please use the save button to save your settings
messages.settings_unexpectedError: Unexpected error occured. Please try again
